name: part_013
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】SHARPLY Unsheathed. Here I Go! 3Dお披露目配信！これが古代兵器の本気。 #AnyaMelfissa3D [QVxgwstf-Aw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Unreal Veil' continues and concludes.
MC section where Anya makes several announcements regarding her original songs, MV, and new merchandise.

subtitles.original: 綺麗な自分を晒すんだ
subtitles.english: Exposing my beautiful self

subtitles.original: 全然生きてるじゃんね
subtitles.english: I'm totally alive, right?

subtitles.original: 怖い？辛い？鼻をくくろう
subtitles.english: Afraid? Hurting? Let's turn our noses up

subtitles.original: 今日からまた叫んじょうぜ
subtitles.english: From today, let's scream again

subtitles.original: 隠してた本当の自分を
subtitles.english: The true self you've been hiding

subtitles.original: ある観客になんないで
subtitles.english: Don't just be an observer

subtitles.original: 甘い？歌も本当にしよう
subtitles.english: Naive? Let's make even the song real

subtitles.original: 可愛く笑って
subtitles.english: Smile cutely

subtitles.original: 楽しく舞って
subtitles.english: Dance joyfully

subtitles.original: 君が笑っているリアルな今日
subtitles.english: A real today where you are smiling

subtitles.original: 戦うんだ嘘も吐いて
subtitles.english: I'll fight, even telling lies

subtitles.original: それもいつかは本当さ 絵も伝う
subtitles.english: Even that will be the truth someday, words also flow

subtitles.original: アンリアルヴェイル
subtitles.english: Unreal Veil

subtitles.original: Whoa! How was that?
subtitles.english: Whoa! How was that?

subtitles.original: My first original song!
subtitles.english: My first original song!

subtitles.original: Bagaimana guys? Original song pertamaku.
subtitles.english: How was it, guys? My first original song.

subtitles.original: Bagi yang sering nanyain, "Ori song mana Anya? Ori song mana Anya?"
subtitles.english: For those who often ask, "Where's the original song, Anya? Where's the original song, Anya?"

subtitles.original: Tuh, dedek! Gimana? Gimana? Keren banget kan?
subtitles.english: There it is! How was it? How was it? It was so cool, right?

subtitles.original: And oh my god, do you guys know that that same original song will be digitally releasing? Here's the jacket!
subtitles.english: And oh my god, do you guys know that that same original song will be digitally releasing? Here's the jacket!

subtitles.original: 「アンリアルヴェイル」作曲ぼっちぼろまるさんの「アンリアルヴェイル」、私の初のオリ曲でございます。デジタルリリース決定！
subtitles.english: "Unreal Veil" composed by Bocchi Boromaru-san, my first original song. Digital release confirmed!

subtitles.original: It will be digitally releasing at July 29th at 0 AM, your time zone.
subtitles.english: It will be digitally releasing at July 29th at 0 AM, your time zone.

subtitles.original: デジタルリリースなんですけど、夜中のね、あの0時。29日夜中の0時ね、あの決定いたしました。
subtitles.english: As for the digital release, it's at midnight, 0 AM. It's set for July 29th at midnight.

subtitles.original: さらに！Not only that, but also my second original song will be digitally releasing as well!
subtitles.english: Furthermore! Not only that, but also my second original song will be digitally releasing as well!

subtitles.original: Not only one song, but two! Two songs!
subtitles.english: Not only one song, but two! Two songs!

subtitles.original: さらに、あの第二のオリジナル曲も同じ時間でデジタルリリース決定！
subtitles.english: Furthermore, the digital release of my second original song at the same time is confirmed!

subtitles.original: 作曲ゆのすけさんです。作曲ゆのすけさんの「Everlasting knife」！
subtitles.english: Composed by Yunosuke-san. "Everlasting knife" by Yunosuke-san!

subtitles.original: Not only one original songs, but two! Oh my goodness, spicy!
subtitles.english: Not only one original songs, but two! Oh my goodness, spicy!

subtitles.original: And also, it's not ending yet. I have a special teaser for you guys.
subtitles.english: And also, it's not ending yet. I have a special teaser for you guys.

subtitles.original: And what is it? What teaser is it? It's for my Unreal Veil MV! Here it is.
subtitles.english: And what is it? What teaser is it? It's for my Unreal Veil MV! Here it is.

subtitles.original:
Digital Release : 2023.7.29 00:00 (土)
MV Release : 2023.8.03 21:00 (木)
subtitles.english:
Digital Release : 2023.7.29 00:00 (Sat)
MV Release : 2023.8.03 21:00 (Thu)

subtitles.original: Oh my god, are you winning Mel-friends? Oh my goodness!
subtitles.english: Oh my god, are you winning Mel-friends? Oh my goodness!

subtitles.original: My original song MV will be premiering at August 3rd.
subtitles.english: My original song MV will be premiering at August 3rd.

subtitles.original: オリ曲のMVはですね、なんと8月3日プレミア公開決定でございます！
subtitles.english: As for the original song MV, it will have a premiere release on August 3rd!

subtitles.original: Please wait for more infos about it. Hehe!
subtitles.english: Please wait for more infos about it. Hehe!

subtitles.original: And also, one more announcement. What is it? Here it is!
subtitles.english: And also, one more announcement. What is it? Here it is!

subtitles.original: Wah! Ada goods lucu banget lho!
subtitles.english: Whoa! There's some really cute merch!

subtitles.original: さらに、えっとちょっと待ってくださいね。なんとですね...
subtitles.english: Furthermore, uh, please wait a moment. You see...

subtitles.original: なんとですね、実物も今持っています！
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, I have the actual item right here!

subtitles.original: This cushion! So cute!
subtitles.english: This cushion! So cute!

subtitles.original: It will be on sale tomorrow after the Holoro mini-live, by the way.
subtitles.english: It will be on sale tomorrow after the Holoro mini-live, by the way.

subtitles.original: 明日のあのID二世のミニライブ後でね、あの発売でございます！
subtitles.english: It will be on sale after tomorrow's ID 2nd generation mini-live!

subtitles.original: Anya Melfissa's special cushion! So cute!
subtitles.english: Anya Melfissa's special cushion! So cute!

subtitles.original: Ya,楽しみだね！
subtitles.english: Yeah, I'm looking forward to it!

subtitles.original: And also, don't forget everyone, tomorrow, Holoro mini-live!
subtitles.english: And also, don't forget everyone, tomorrow, Holoro mini-live!

subtitles.original: Ada Holoro mini-live ya besok guys, jangan lupa!
subtitles.english: There's a Holoro mini-live tomorrow, guys, don't forget!

subtitles.original: And yeah, that's it! Oh my god, thank you so much.
subtitles.english: And yeah, that's it! Oh my god, thank you so much.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much everyone for supporting till the end. Thank you, thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you so much everyone for supporting till the end. Thank you, thank you!

subtitles.original: いや、こんな感じの3Dお披露目でございます。
subtitles.english: Well, this was my 3D showcase.

subtitles.original: いや、本当にみんな、ありがとう！Thank you so much everyone!
subtitles.english: Man, truly everyone, thank you! Thank you so much everyone!

subtitles.original: And I'll see you guys tomorrow with Ollie and Reine!
subtitles.english: And I'll see you guys tomorrow with Ollie and Reine!

subtitles.original: 明日のね、あのミニライブもよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to tomorrow's mini-live as well!

subtitles.original: いや、感動するね。感動しますね。
subtitles.english: Man, I'm moved. It's moving.

subtitles.original: Oh my god. I'm filled with a lot of feelings.
subtitles.english: Oh my god. I'm filled with a lot of feelings.
